thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Mathew

author: Mathew
title: Mathew
text: I like saving time and money. I've found the best rates on flighthub, give or take a couple %. At the end of the day I can comfortably purchase from flighthub knowing I'm paying in my countries currency and reasonably around the value of the ticket, without costing too much of my time. I always cross reference multiple websites and flighthub always matches their rates. The odd time I find a better rate, I take it, but herein so far I've booked 80% of the time with flighthub. I fly about twice yearly :)
